name: sfpower-managescratchorg
description: Create/Delete a scratch org, This task is part of SFPowerscripts
helpMarkDown: Creates or deletes a scratch org on the provided devhub with scratch defintion file. The devhub must be authenticated and the alias is a requirement for this command to work
author: azlam.abdulsalam

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action

options.Delete: Delete an earlier created scratch org

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the action required to operate on scratchorg

inputs.name: config_file_path
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in the current working directory containing  config file for the scratch org

inputs.name: target_org
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in the current working directory containing  config file for the scratch org

inputs.name: devhub_alias
inputs.label: Alias/Username of the devhub
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the alias of the devhub previously authenticated, default value is HubOrg if using the Authenticate Devhub task

inputs.name: working_directory
inputs.label: Working directory to be installed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Keep it blank in the build pipeline, pass the repo directory in the release pipeline

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_scratch_org_url
OutputVariables.description: The URL of the scratch org that was created

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_scratch_org_username
OutputVariables.description: The username of the scratch org that was created
